name: Orbito
description:
Made for Godot Wild Jam 34

Go to different planets and shoot enemy ships to progress! Return to the hub world to go to other planets

Controls

A/D - Steer Ship

Left Mouse - Shoot

Escape - Menu

Credits

Code, 3D Models, Music: aptos

Font: Sci-Fied

Background image: Space Backgrounds by screamingbrain

* Update: I exported GLES3 instead of GLES2, making the game not work on some laptops. I have re-uploaded the game so it works on all computers
